skill_i.tooltip: Kled is mounted on Skaarl and while mounted, Skaarl takes damage. Once Skaarl loses all of his health, Skaarl flees and Kled is dismounted cleansing him and making him invulnerable and untargetable for a few seconds. Kled can remount himself by gaining enough Courage from landing abilities and other sources.

skill_q.tooltip: When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

skill_w.tooltip: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

skill_e.tooltip: When mounted, Kled dashes dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

skill_r.tooltip: When mounted, Kled and Skaarl charges to the target location granting lots of bonus Movement Speed to the duo and ally champions. Skaarl homes in on the first enemy champion, dealing damage and knocking them back.
